mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NO , M.MEM_NAME FROM EMP E, MEMBER M WHERE E.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO AND EMP_JOB=1
SELECT E.EMP_NO , M.MEM_NAME FROM EMP E, MEMBER M WHERE E.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO AND EMP_JOB=1 AND EMP_COLL=#{collNo}
SELECT E.EMP_NO , M.MEM_NAME FROM EMP E, MEMBER M WHERE E.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO AND EMP_JOB=2
SELECT E.EMP_NO , M.MEM_NAME FROM EMP E, MEMBER M WHERE E.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO AND EMP_JOB=2 AND EMP_COLL=#{collNo}
SELECT EMP_NO ,EMP_CLASS ,EMP_DEPT ,EMP_COLL ,EMP_JOB FROM EMP WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
